solidbase.maven
Class Progress

java.lang.Object
  solidbase.core.ProgressListener
      solidbase.maven.Progress

public class Progress
extends ProgressListener

Implements the progress listener for the Maven plugin.

Author:
Ruud de Jong, René M. de Bloois
